name: normit
description: Google Translate with speech synthesis in your terminal.
helpMessage:
=========NORMIT=========
Usage:
normit 'source_language' 'target_language' 'text'

Example: normit en fr 'hey cowboy where is your horse?'
=> 'hey cow-boy ou est votre cheval?'

Options:
-t - speech synthesis
-s - synonyms list

Check docs at: github.com/pawurb/normit
noPlayerMsg:
Normit speech synthesis requires mpg123 installed.
Please run 'brew install mpg123'
wrongParamsMsg: NORMIT: Wrong data. Example: 'normit en es the cowboy' => 'el vaquero'
